meta.title: Mr. Whisk Trapped in Foggy Invisible Box

beats.visual: Spotlight snaps on; Mr. Whisk pats the air, hits unseen wall.
beats.gag_note: Sound effect of gentle glass ping.

beats.visual: Mr. Whisk traces box outline; sparkles mark imaginary edges.
Invisible elevator lever lowers Mr. Whisk dramatically.
Mr. Whisk pulls invisible rope; imaginary anvil hovers overhead.
Invisible door opens; Mr. Whisk smacks into side panel.
Mr. Whisk climbs invisible ladder, floating higher with each paw.
Box suddenly shrinks; Mr. Whisk's whiskers squish comically.
Invisible confetti rains as Mr. Whisk escapes with flourish.
Mr. Whisk runs into new wall, shrugs to camera.

tts_line: Mr. Whisk keeps finding walls that only exist in mime-land.
style_prompt: cartoon orange tabby cat, squash-and-stretch, clean bold outlines, flat colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, spotlit stage with invisible box mimed by cartoon cat, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
